Title: Killaboss on Corpse-rippa Vulcha
Legend: The Killaboss rules through strength as well as cunning, for he has an expert eye for picking out an enemy’s weak spot and driving a blade into it. In battle, those who ride the immense raptor-like creatures known as Corpse-rippa Vulchas dive out of the mists without warning, striking from nowhere to gut the enemy force.
Intro: A Killaboss on Corpse-rippa Vulcha is armed with a Jagged Boss-stikka.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Thumb

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Corpse-rippa Vulcha is armed with a Beak and Flesh-tearing Talons, and a Stinger. The Venom-encrusted Weapons battle trait applies to attacks made with a Corpse-rippa Vulcha’s Beak and Flesh-tearing Talons and its Stinger even though it is a mount.

Rules.Name: All Part Of Da Plan
Rules.Fluff: Kruleboyz tend to be very impressed by a Killaboss’s kunnin’ feats - so long as the boss has a plan, they are willing to face down even the most unlikely odds.
Rules.Rule: All Part of Da Plan: If a friendly KRULEBOYZ unit fails a battleshock test within 3" of any friendly units with this ability, only 1 model in that unit will flee.

Rules.Name: Commanding View
Rules.Fluff: From their position high above the battlefield, a Killaboss riding a Corpse-rippa Vulcha can keep a careful eye on the battle as it unfolds, allowing them to issue exactly the right command wherever or whenever it is needed.
Rules.Rule: You can use the same command ability more than once in the same phase if you pick this unit to issue the command (this unit still cannot issue more than 1 command in the same phase and a unit still cannot receive more than 1 command in the same phase).
